Softcover, ISBN 0140266909 Publisher: Penguin Books, New York, 1997 Used - Very Good. Trade paperback. Many black and white photographs. The bottom front cover has a 1/4th inch tear at the spine. The book is signed on title page by Legs McNeil and has a small yellow sticker on the lower right-hand cover, "Autographed". Size: 8vo - over 7¾" - 9¾" tall (POPULAR MUSIC ROCK-N-ROLL HISTORY) Price reflects $1.50 discount; must enter coupon code “A46LP8” at checkout to receive discount.

ISBN 0802115888 Publisher: Grove Press, New York, 1996 Used. First printing, with a complete numbe line. Very good in a very good unclipped dust jacket, with the jacket showing some slight wear to the jacket spine at crown, general edgewear. Some slight waviness to the lower edge of the text block for the first 100 pages, suggestive of an encounter with moisture but no obvious dampstaining.
